mapper.select: -- SELECT title, -- (SELECT dict_name -- from sys_dict_data -- where dict_type = 'LOG_TYPE' and dict_value = log.business_type) typeName, -- COUNT(oper_id) num -- FROM sys_oper_log log -- WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) <= date (log.oper_time) -- and log.business_type not in (14 -- , 15) -- group by business_type, title -- order by num desc -- SELECT DATE_FORMAT(log.oper_time, '%m-%d') AS days, -- COUNT(oper_id) num -- FROM sys_oper_log log -- WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date (log.oper_time) -- group by -- days select DATE_FORMAT(t2._date, '%m-%d') as date, IFNULL(t3.count, 0) as count from ( select (@s := @s + 1) as _index, STR_TO_DATE(DATE(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, interval @s day)), '%Y-%c-%d') as _date from sys_oper_log, ( select @s :=-1) as init where @s < 6 order by _date) as t2 left join ( select DATE_FORMAT(t1.oper_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as days, count(*) as count from ( select * from sys_oper_log where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), interval 6 day) <= date(oper_time) ) t1 group by days) as t3 on t2._date = t3.days group by t2._date;
